name: Dil To Pagal Hai
story: A grand musical about three passionate and dreamy characters: Rahul, Pooja and Nisha. Will their dreams come true? Will they find their true love?

actors.name: Madhuri Dixit
actors.description: Madhuri Dixit is one of the most acclaimed actors and Kathak dancers Bollywood have ever witnessed.
actors.known_for: Devdas, Hum apke hai kaun, Dil to pagal hai

actors.name: Shahrukh Khan
actors.description: Shahrukh Khan also known by the initialism SRK, is an Indian actor, film producer, and television personality. Referred to in the media as the "Badshah of Bollywood", "King of Bollywood" and "King Khan", he has appeared in more than 80 Bollywood films, and earned numerous accolades, including 14 Filmfare Awards.
actors.known_for: DDLJ, Don, Devdas, Chuk de India, Dil to pagal hai, Chennai Express

actors.name: Karishma Kapoor
actors.description: Born into Bombay filmdom's legendary Kapoor clan, Karisma began appearing on the silver screen during 1991 to date, with a total of over 60 movies to her credit.
actors.known_for: Anari, Raja Hindustani, Andaz Apna Apna, Coolie no.1

name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhi Gam
story: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now grown up little brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family again.

actors.name: Shahrukh Khan
actors.description: Shahrukh Khan also known by the initialism SRK, is an Indian actor, film producer, and television personality. Referred to in the media as the "Badshah of Bollywood", "King of Bollywood" and "King Khan", he has appeared in more than 80 Bollywood films, and earned numerous accolades, including 14 Filmfare Awards.
actors.known_for: DDLJ, Don, Devdas, Chuk de India, Dil to pagal hai, Chennai Express

actors.name: Hrithik Roshan
actors.description: Hrithik Roshan is an Indian actor, well known globally for his versatile roles, unmatchable dancing skills and attractive looks.
actors.known_for: Super 30, Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara, Lakshya, Jodha Akbar

actors.name: Kajol
actors.description: Kajol, an Indian actress, well known for movies like DDLJ, Baazigar. Daughter of Tanuja and Shomu Mukherjee and niece of Nutan.
actors.known_for: Kuchh Kuchh Hota hai, My Name is Khan, Fanaa, DDLJ

actors.name: Kareen Kapoor
actors.description: Kareen, an Indian actress, born into Bombay filmdom's legendary Kapoor clan, She is one of the most sought-after actresses in Bollywood, considered bankable, with an enviable A-listing and as of June 2007 is to appear in 'Tashan', 'Lajjo', 'Kismat Talkies' amongst others.
actors.known_for: Jab We met, Omkara, 3 Idiots, Chameli

name: DDLJ
story: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.
